reviews.review: Este jogo tem ótimo um single e multiplayer, envolvente, inteligente, e principalmente "divertido".

Love the game.... Very enjoyable and have had some great fun playing it.. cant wait for more Valve games

Like the first game, Portal 2 showcases unique gameplay with impressive polish. The puzzles are smart, the story is engaging, and everything works in gameplay. Co-op is excellently designed, with very few spots that can really stump players for long. Replayability is somewhat limited after figuring out the solutions, but Workshop support means you can play a multitude of single-player and co-op community levels. Nothing really made me unhappy with the game. It's not quite the amazing experience of the first game, but the first time is always memorable. This is still a ton of fun.
Jogo incrivel sem mais, compre e seja feliz!
Piles of fun.  For 6-10 hours.  Some replay value, but it is a puzzle game, so you need to wait a year or so to forget the solutions, or pointedly try to find new ones.

Portal 2 is a real gem. Its puzzles will twist your mind. The characters will win your heart and embed themselves in your mind and the mechanics will bring you hours of fun.

Portal 2 is the sequal to Valve's original portal and packs an even bigger punch than its predecessor with better graphics and bigger stories. Portal 2 tells the Story of Chell without even having to say a word. The silent protaganist gets into all sorts of shenanigans with her dimwitted robot companion and Supercomputer nemisis gladOS. Solving puzzles feel very satisfying, the difficulty ramp isnt too steep, Portal 2 also features a multiplayer mode, if you have any comrades to play with and features community puzzles to solve if you get bored with the main story.

With that kind of content system you can occupy yourself with potentially endless experiments and test chambers to solve. So purchase this digital entertainment product if you wish I can gurantee, that you will not regret your decision.

Numerical Rating 10/10
Buy it.

What can I say. Valve always tends to put out quality games and Portal 2 is no exception.From the graphics to the story and voice acting to the amazing puzzle level design every thing is top notch. In a world where most games are serious and violent this games lighter side is also greatly appreciated, it'll have you laughing from one chamber to the next. I've played through this game twice now. The last time with my girlfriend and I have to say this is a great game for a gamer couple to sit and have some quality time together with as well. I can reccomened both portal games enough!
Simply the greatest gaming experience ever created.  SOMEHOW they managed to take one of the best games ever and make it even better.

This is an amazing game that has literally changed my life, able to relate to the persnoalities of the very few characters there are, even able to see the psychology behind them if look hard enough- I love how they played out the interactions of between chell, wheatley, and glados, and having puzzles about spatial awareness to go through to be able to continue the story. I also love how it keeps with how isolated you are despite adding another character, a very talkitive and supporting one at that- it shows you can never really trust anyone and must keep surviving on your own strength/determination. my only downside of the game is that theres not enough of it, no new materials- but at the same time its good that everything isnt spelled out so that we can theorize about parts of the game we dont understand. 10/10 game, everyone should play it and the first game at least twice, maybe three times. 8)
Don't ask and play it.

어떻게 포탈을 총으로 쏴서 즉흥적으로 포탈을 만들어 탈출하는 아이디어를 생각해냈을까?

분명 퍼즐게임인데 전혀 지루하지도 않고 스토리도 좋은걸까?

전작 포탈1에 비해 추가된 것들이 많다.
절대 포탈1과 이번작과 동일하다 생각하다면 큰오산이다.

새롭게 추가된 함정, 새로운 해결방식들, 새로운 블럭들, 더욱 어려워진 난이도, 새로 갈아버린 그래픽, 더좋아진 스토리!

나오는 등장인물은 이렇다.

주인공은 전작과 같다. 우리의 시점이 되줄 Chell.
포탈2에 다시 부활한 GLaDOS는 포탈1을 경험한 유저로서 반가웠고, 충격이였다.
새롭게 추가된 우리 귀여운 Wheatley는 게임하는 내내 떠들어대서 지루하지 않았다.
꽤나 재치있는 친구.(개인적이지만 목소리가 너무 좋다)


맵중간중간에 비밀스러운 도전과제 혹은 웃긴 도전과제들이 많았다.

플래이 하는내내 정말 재미있었다.
혹, 어려운 난이도를 맞닥뜨리게 된다면, 머리를 쥐어짜 해결하여 얻는 성취감이 좋았다.
(그래서 늘 플래이하면서 엘레베이터가 반가웠다.)

더 특별한 점이 있다면?
친구와 함께 멀티로 즐길수 있다는점!
커뮤니티를통해, 자기가 만든 맵을 만들어 공유할수 있고.
다른사람이 만든 맵을 플래이 할수있다!



19.99$란 숫자가 안아까울 정도로 정말 재미있다.

한마디로 짧게 평가하자면.

Fan de puzzle game ou pas vous DEVEZ faire ce jeu si ce n'est pas déjà fait. C'est le genre d'expérience que l'on retrouve rarement dans le jeu vidéo. Portal 2 ne fait pas que surpasser le premier opus. Il excelle dans tout les domaines. Le scénario prenant du début à la fin, avec un univers fascinant. Des personnages attachants, les doublages français valent pour une fois, très argement le coup, c'est toujours un plaisir d'entendre la voix robotique de Glados. Pour ce qui est du gameplay, j'ai été absolument bluffé, le concept marche parfaitement bien, et est encore mieux maitrisé que dans le premier épisode, avec notamment de nouveaux élément comme la peinture qui permet de bondir ou aller plus vite. C'est fluide, c'est intuitif, rien à redire. Enfin, l'ambiance sonore est juste parfaite et nous immerge dans l'univers comme jamais.

Pour résumer Portal, Half Life et Pixar font un enfant et cet enfant est un puzzle game.

This has a completely different feel to it than the first Portal, but it's really fun.  It has fun music, an intense storyline that adds to the first game, good graphics for my personal expectations, and has an easy map builder - which helps you not to just play the campaign over and over until it gets boring.

Apart for the short story and some little problems not worth mentioning, this game is perfect! With the originality, the unique story, the Coop mode and a joke every now and then, I'm safe to say this is my favorite game at the moment. I have honestly never played a game like this. The puzzles were challenging and fun to do. I also have to mention that they did a great job on balancing the puzzles and the story so it doesn't get repetitive. 

Also there is a coop mode where you and your partner play with a different portal device, making the puzzles even more challenging. There is a handy pinging option, and a ping that counts down for when you have to do the same action simultaneously. This makes it very easy to tell your partner what to do.

Even if you have completed the entire story, and completed all maps in coop mode, you can still play or even make player made maps. These can also be solo or cooperative. Therefor there are plenty of maps to play after the story.

If you're not into common games (like shooters, MMO's etc.), then you should defenitely get Portal and/or Portal 2.
